version_description: Check out ELSA's Dictionary to learn common phrases for Mother's Day.
Check out ELSA's Dictionary to learn common phrases for Mother's Day.

This update makes the app more stable. Here's a haiku (a form of Japanese poem)
The Dictionary now
Tells you about movies that help
You learn English faster

This update makes the app more stable. Here's a haiku (a form of Japanese poem)
The Dictionary now
Tells you about movies that help
You learn English faster

Here is a haiku (form of Japanese poem):

Independence Day
When fireworks fly in the sky
People cheer and play

Here is a haiku (form of Japanese poem):

Independence Day
When fireworks fly in the sky
People cheer and play
Improved stability.
Improved stability.
Improved stability.
Improved stability.
We have completely rebuilt the way your voice is transmitted. You'll experience more reliable and accurate results from Elsa.
We have completely rebuilt the way your voice is transmitted. You'll experience more reliable and accurate results from Elsa.

ELSA is now in both English and Vietamese.

To see ELSA in Vietnamese, go to your "Profile" -> Display Language-> select Vietnamese "

ELSA is now in both English and Vietamese.

To see ELSA in Vietnamese, go to your "Profile" -> Display Language-> select Vietnamese "
Elsa’s conversation games got a brand new look.
Elsa’s conversation games got a brand new look.
Exercises now fit into different iPhones screen sizes.
Exercises now fit into different iPhones screen sizes.
Video tutorials just arrived! Videos are currently in Vietnamese only. Watch new video tutorials by going to the topic: "Practice with Dan Hauer."
Video tutorials just arrived! Videos are currently in Vietnamese only. Watch new video tutorials by going to the topic: "Practice with Dan Hauer."
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
This version provides a more stable voice recording experience.
This version provides a more stable voice recording experience.
This update improves the reliability of voice recordings.
This update improves the reliability of voice recordings.
Don't be scared of English. ELSA's Halloween update is here.
Don't be scared of English. ELSA's Halloween update is here.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixing.
Bug fixing.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

Are you ready for summer? We are! Join Elsa and 3 million other learners from around the world to practice English this summer! We have new conversation topics to get you ready for ordering poolside drinks ;)
For more Elsa news, follow us on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter @elsa_speak
